mapper.sql: id, name, industry, worktype, course_type, remark, operator, operate_time, operate_ip
mapper.insert: insert into exam_train_course (id, name, industry, worktype, course_type, remark, operator, operate_time, operate_ip, picture) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into exam_train_course
id,
name,
industry,
worktype,
course_type,
remark,
operator,
operate_time,
operate_ip,
picture,

mapper.update:
update exam_train_course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
worktype = #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_train_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, worktype = #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_train_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, worktype = #{worktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_type = #{courseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.*,(a.video_course_score+a.book_course_score) as course_score From (select *,(SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT a.course_id from exam_train_course_material as a INNER JOIN exam_train_material as b on a.material_id = b.id where b.content_type = 1) as b where b.course_id = a.id ) as video_material_number, (SELECT count(1) FROM exam_train_course_material WHERE course_id = a.id) as material_number , (SELECT SUM(b.score) FROM (SELECT a.course_id,b.score from exam_train_course_material as a INNER JOIN exam_train_material as b on a.material_id = b.id where b.content_type = 1) as b where b.course_id = a.id GROUP BY b.course_id ) as video_course_score, (SELECT SUM(b.score) FROM (SELECT a.course_id,b.score from exam_train_course_material as a INNER JOIN exam_train_material as b on a.material_id = b.id where b.content_type = 2) as b where b.course_id = a.id GROUP BY b.course_id ) as book_course_score, (SELECT SUM(b.score*b.completion_rate) FROM (SELECT a.course_id,b.score,b.course_id as course_id_b,b.completion_rate as completion_rate from exam_train_course_material as a INNER JOIN (SELECT a.*,b.course_id,b.completion_rate FROM exam_train_material as a INNER JOIN exam_train_ca_material as b on a.id=b.train_material_id and b.completion_rate =1 and b.ca_id = #{caId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) as b on a.material_id = b.id) as b where b.course_id = a.id and b.course_id_b = a.id GROUP BY b.course_id ) as ca_score from exam_train_course as a where worktype = #{workTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})as a
